summary: This is an FAA aircraft registration statement for PLAN D, LLC, a limited liability company organized in the U.S. Virgin Islands. The document identifies Jeffrey E. Epstein as a member and Lawrence Visoski as the manager of the LLC, which is registering an aircraft.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Listed as a member of PLAN D, LLC, the entity registering the aircraft, with his U.S. citizenship verified.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.context: Identified as the manager of PLAN D, LLC who signed the registration statement on behalf of the company.

connections.description: Epstein is a member of PLAN D, LLC and Visoski is the manager of the same LLC, indicating a business/management relationship.

events.title: Formation of PLAN D, LLC
events.description: The effective date when PLAN D, LLC was lawfully organized in the U.S. Virgin Islands.

events.title: Aircraft Registration Filing
events.description: The date when Lawrence Visoski signed and filed the statement in support of aircraft registration for PLAN D, LLC with the FAA.

keyFacts: PLAN D, LLC, a company with Jeffrey E. Epstein as a member, was formed in the U.S. Virgin Islands on October 19, 2012.
The LLC, managed by Lawrence Visoski, filed to register an aircraft with the FAA, asserting compliance with U.S. citizenship requirements.
The document was filed with the FAA Aircraft Registry in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, and accepted on March 31, 2017.
